item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a fun Sunday Evening Dinner @ The Tavern at Quarry Hills, Quincy, MA.

The Tavern at Quarry Hills has an outstanding and reasonable price menu. You can check out the menu and prices at their website. The Tavern is on the beautiful golf course of The Tavern at Granite Links Golf Club in Quincy. The Tavern was voted one of the fifty "Best 19th Holes in the Country".

The cuisine is considered superior and served in the most spectacular settings that have floor to ceiling windows that overlook the golf course that displays the sunset views of the Boston skyline are some of the winning ingredients to success of dinning at the the Tavern. The view of the city from the Tavern is breathtaking.

The Tavern does not accept reservations so if you could be on time (5:00pm) to be seated it would be greatly appreciated by everyone involved. We cannot be seated until all are present so please be considerate to the rest of the group and be there by 5PM.

Aso this would be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Dinner @ The Tavern at Quarry Hills, Sunday March 28th Sunday, @ 5:00pm
100 Quarry Hills Drive
Quincy, Ma 02169
617-689-1900
http://www.granitelin...

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Jeanne."

Event Organizer(s): Alison & Jeanne

Min/Max: Min of 6 people 48 hours in advance. Max of 12 people.

Guests: None.

Fees: Annual Members - FREE, Group Members - $2

RSVP Deadline: 11:00AM on Saturday, March 27th. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer and will be considered a No-Show per our guidelines on the About Us page.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: TBD - Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "Weather").

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:
Courtesy of the website w/ some additional information thrown in: The Tavern at Quarry Hills

Granite Links Golf Club is conveniently located less than 7 miles from downtown Boston in Quincy and Milton, MA. It is located at the top of the road/hill so drive all the way up! (Hence the beautiful view of Boston.)

Our main entrance is located just off Route 93.

Take Exit 8 (Furnace Brook Parkway) and follow the signs to "Quarry Hills."

If coming from the North, this exit 8 off-ramp will run parallel to the expressway for a short distance, coming down to the Men's Wearhouse and Tux building on your right with a stone sign for Quarry Hills. Take a right here onto Ricciuti Drive. Continue straight ahead approximately one mile to the club entrance on your left at Quarry Hills Drive.

If coming from the South, this exit 8 off ramp will split into left/right forks twice. First stay to the left then stay to the right, each time following signs for “Quarry Hills.” At the stop sign by Curry Hardware, go left, crossing under the highway to the southbound side. At the stop sign at the Men's Wearhouse and Tux building, go straight across onto Ricciuti Drive. Follow for approximately one mile to the club entrance on your left at Quarry Hills Drive.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. Late arrivals should ask the host for "Alison or Jeanne."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: The Tavern at Quarry Hills
